Author: TonyL#3577
Content: @Strob ```./komodo-cli -ac_name=ROGUE cclib extract 17 \"[%22gametxid%22,%22pubkey%22]\"``` after execution in output you'll see the command to start replay

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
Current gold cashing formula in singleplayer is:
`extracted_rogue_satoshies = gold * gold * dungeon_level * 10 `

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: @TonyL pushed version that displays gametxid and batontxid for playerinfo. You can start with any playertxid (from tokenid to latest unspent) and it will trace the spends to find where the unspent token is and that is the batontxid. it should then be easy to see if that tx is a DEX tx or not

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: I can add some batonstatus info if that is not easy for your

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
@barv ```./komodo-cli -ac_name=ROGUE cclib bailout 17 \"[%22 470951049fa24bf5800d3b36c22dd3391ff13690688f538af576ff32117c32f3%22]\"```
 for manual bailout
